title: CSV
description: A comma-separated values (CSV) file stores tabular data (numbers and text) in plain-text form

help.description: This action will read the CSV attachment of the incoming message or from the specified URL and output a JSON object.
Multiple incoming events can be combined into one CSV file with the write CSV action.

uploadToAttachment.label: Upload CSV as file to attachments
uploadToAttachment.description: If checked store the generated CSV data as an attachment

separator.label: Separator
separator.note: A single char used to delimit the CSV file. Default to ','

order.label: Column Order
order.note: A string delimited with the separator (use same as above) indicating which columns & in what order the columns should appear in the resulting file. If omitted, the column order in the resulting file will not be deterministic.
